title: WTF is Through-Zero FM?
description:
Based on a blog post from Patchwerks: https://shrsl.com/440q8
Waveform image from ModWiggler user  Dr. Sketch-n-Etch in this thread on TZFM: https://modwiggler.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=107886
Get the VCV Rack project on Patchstorage: https://patchstorage.com/tzfm-playground/
